en: But the ones who believe and do righteous deeds -
We will admit them
We will admit them to gardens
We will admit them to gardens
beneath which rivers flow,
beneath which rivers flow,
wherein they will abide forever.
But the ones who believe and do righteous deeds -
We will admit them to gardens
We will admit them to gardens
beneath which rivers flow,
beneath which rivers flow,
wherein they will abide forever.
[It is] the promise of Allah, [which is] truth,
[It is] the promise of Allah, [which is] truth,
and who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
It [i.e., Paradise] is not [obtained] by your wishful thinking
nor by that of the People of the Scripture.
It [i.e., Paradise] is not [obtained] by your wishful thinking
nor by that of the People of the Scripture.
Whoever does a wrong will be recompensed for it,

ar: وَلَا يَجِدْ لَهُ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ
en: and he will not find besides Allah
a protector or a helper.
